text: The student campus of KPI named after Igor Sikorsky is conducting a survey among dormitory residents regarding "Preparing the population for national resistance". 📌 This is a one-day or five-day training course for KPI students, conducted by instructors from the training department as part of the project "Preparing the population for national resistance" at the locations of the State Educational Institution "KPK with enhanced military and physical training". ☘️ The course is free. The program includes training, field trips to the training ground, and a tactical medicine course. 🫂 The survey aims to assess the readiness of students for military-patriotic training. After analyzing the responses, the student campus will form groups of students. [Take the survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeIe7nZPhIoxXZwAQ3NISn3BbvNph31yR26tf8SHlool-Q8iA/viewform)
rephrased_news: The student campus of KPI is conducting a survey among dormitory residents about a training course on national resistance preparation. This course, offered for free, will include training, field trips, and tactical medicine instruction. The survey aims to evaluate students' readiness for military-patriotic training, and groups will be formed based on the responses.
title: KPI Dorm Survey on National Resistance

text: 🌡️ **Heating network repairs** Hot water supply is absent in some dormitories on Braichevskogo and Yangelya streets. According to Kyivteploenergo, the estimated time of return is tomorrow at 15:00. @kpicampus
rephrased_news: Some dormitories on Braichevskogo and Yangelya streets are currently without hot water due to heating network repairs. Kyivteploenergo estimates that service will be restored by tomorrow at 15:00.
title: Hot Water Outage on Braichevskogo

text: **Due to an emergency in the heating network in the Solomyansky district, repair work is being carried out. **⛔️💦 Hot water supply in the student campus will be unavailable until 13.10.23 (estimated restoration time by 23:00)
rephrased_news: Repair work is underway on the heating network in the Solomyansky district, resulting in a temporary suspension of hot water supply in the student campus until 13.10.23, with restoration expected by 23:00.
title: Hot Water Unavailable in Solomyansky

text: 🔮 Legends say that once the SRG organized movie nights, so.. **Let's go watch a movie together!** 🥳☺️ A pleasant company and soft poufs are guaranteed✨ ✅ When? 14.10.2023 at 21:30 ✅ Where? 7th floor hall P.S. Bring your favorite cup, we provide coffee and tea, you bring a good mood!🌞 🫖☕️ #movie_night
rephrased_news: A movie night is being organized, inviting participants to enjoy films together. The event will take place on 14.10.2023 at 21:30 in the 7th-floor hall, with coffee and tea provided.
title: Movie Night at KPI

text: **For students living in the student campus of KPI named after Igor Sikorsky, enrollment is announced for a training course on preparation for National Resistance**! 🔸 This week, starting from 23.10.2023, KPI students living in dormitories will begin a five-day course on the basics of tactical medicine, mine-explosive safety, and tactical training. In conditions as close to combat as possible, using pyrotechnics. This group of students is already the second; currently, recruitment for the third group is ongoing, which will start training on 30.10.2023. You can watch how it was [in the video.](https://youtu.be/PRQ069-jT9A) 😉 Training will be held on a regular basis, and a new group of students will start every Monday. To join the next group – [register via the link](https://forms.gle/8TGFP8N8a3GWYKBc9) and the organizers will contact you, and join the group via the link: https://t.me/+99UnT86pbCk0MDgy. Upon completion of the course, you will definitely receive a certificate of completion. 📝 [Registration](https://forms.gle/8TGFP8N8a3GWYKBc9) 🕑 **When:** until October 29, 2023.
rephrased_news: Enrollment is open for a five-day training course on national resistance preparation for KPI students living in dormitories, starting from 23.10.2023. The course will cover tactical medicine and safety training in combat-like conditions. A new group will begin training every Monday, with registration ongoing.
title: KPI National Resistance Training Enrollment

text: [​​](https://telegra.ph/file/545af418e6783924e0fae.jpg)Who wants to visit the gym - join the [chat](https://t.me/+nwzGCFZhFZA3NTgy), register there using the pinned link. The mandatory condition for visiting the gym is: 1. Register 2. Take turns according to the schedule.
rephrased_news: Students interested in visiting the gym are encouraged to join a chat for registration. Participants must register and follow the schedule for gym access.
title: Join the Gym Chat

text: [​​](https://telegra.ph/file/4f31281343d9f30ec67da.jpg)🎃👻 HURRY TO SAVE YOURSELF! 👻🎃 Halloween is the time when evil spirits come out of control! But we know how to fight them! 🛡 Our neomolfars are true professionals in the protection against mermaids, vampires, and werewolves. What we offer: 🛡 Protection from evil forces all night from 31.10 to 01.11; 🔮 Magical amulets that will protect you and your neighbors; 🪄 Trials, upon successful completion of which you will receive honor, glory, and long-awaited protection. Enjoy terrifying Halloween adventures without worrying about your safety! Fill out the [form](https://forms.gle/qGBqfqbNZnhuGNw38) and book your protectors right now! 📝🔮 🌙 Date and time of the ritual: evening of October 31 📍 Location: in your room! Fill out the [form](https://forms.gle/qGBqfqbNZnhuGNw38) to order the service of neomolfars:
rephrased_news: A Halloween event is planned, offering protection from evil spirits on the night of October 31 to November 1. Participants can fill out a form to book protective services and receive magical amulets.
title: Halloween Protection Services Offered

text: [​​](https://telegra.ph/file/5e53a99ee3b59fc908e6f.jpg)🎃👻 Halloween is coming soon! 🎃👻 🟠 Hurry up and fill out the [Google form](https://forms.gle/qGBqfqbNZnhuGNw38) if you want your room to be protected from monsters on the night of October 31 to November 1. 🔵 To receive protection, you need to pass a small trial from our neomolfars (the trial will take about 5-10 minutes). 🟡 In the [Google form](https://forms.gle/qGBqfqbNZnhuGNw38), indicate your preferred time for the visit to your room (but keep in mind that neomolfars may come a little earlier or later, depending on how the trials of other participants go). 🟣 Not everyone will be able to receive the desired protection, so be attentive and brave when the neomolfars visit you!
rephrased_news: Students can fill out a form to secure protection from monsters during Halloween, which involves a brief trial. Participants should indicate their preferred time for the visit.
title: Halloween Room Protection Trials

text: [❤️](https://telegra.ph/file/f4df71ea778c26eea6a46.png)** Donor Day at KPI**__ **▫️** We invite you to join the traditional Donor Day at KPI for the benefit of the Kyiv City Blood Center, from where your blood will be delivered to those who need it most. Donating is voluntary and free, but there will be small treats waiting for you from our partners. ▫️ What is needed for a successful donation: • be over 18 years old (inclusive) and weigh over 55 kg; • familiarize yourself with [temporary](https://www.donor.ua/pages/5) and [absolute](https://www.donor.ua/pages/4) contraindications to donation; • follow the [donor diet;](http://kmck.kiev.ua/pidgotovka-donora/) • definitely have breakfast in the morning; • bring your passport. 💪 Together we can move this world from a hopeless point! **📝 **[Registration is mandatory!](https://forms.gle/bxVuuyFTaKH9agr97) The number of places is limited.[ ](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd1iF25BH7wegj9Hy8ccZk-0HqRanGgE2PqVKFDVI6UKMMSeQ/viewform)🕑 **When: **November 27 (Mon) from 9:30 to 13:00. 📍**Where:** [Social Service premises,](https://www.google.com/maps/dir//%D1%81%D1%82%D1%83%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82%D1%81%D1%8C%D0%BA%D0%B0+%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%86%D1%96%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D0%B0+%D1%81%D0%BB%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B0/@50.4502198,30.4465351,16z/data=!4m8!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x40d4cd564e305e37:0x83e252d0bb8a4977!2m2!1d30.4507936!2d50.4465434) 144 Borshchahivska St. (dormitory 20, entrance on the left). In case of an air raid, you can use the nearest [shelter](https://t.me/dnvr_31/1893). [💭](https://goo.gl/maps/taEFpY5fVE51okgi8) Social Service on [telegram](http://t.me/sss_kpi) | [instagram](http://instagram.com/sss.ntuu.kpi) | [youtube.](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZKbCSXqkSHDKUC4S0u-6xg) Feedback: @ask_sss_bot #DNVR #student_social_service
rephrased_news: KPI is hosting a Donor Day to benefit the Kyiv City Blood Center. Participation is voluntary, and donors will receive small treats. Registration is required, and the event will take place on November 27 from 9:30 to 13:00.
title: Donor Day at KPI

text: **Board game evening (25.11) - done✅** **Bright impressions and positive emotions - received✅** We express our sincere gratitude to our partners for the wonderful prizes! **🍕Our Bakery of Capital Traditions:** Thank you for the incredibly delicious cookies that filled our evening with warmth and flavor! __P.S. We are revealing from the heart information about discounts on products at the bakery. In the evening from 19:00 to 21:00, there is a 20% discount on all baked goods, pies, and pastries. In the morning from 8:00 to 11:00, there is a 30% discount. There is also a promotion on pizza 1+1=3. When buying two pizzas, the third one is free.__ [Borshchahivska St., 128](https://maps.app.goo.gl/W6umedExeY4cRYB76) **🎲 **[**Geekach:**](https://geekach.com.ua/) Thank you for the board games that, uniting us, became the foundation of our event. **💃 **[**KPI Trade Union:**](https://t.me/pskpi) Thanks for the warm tea and gifts that became wonderful rewards for the participants of the evening. **🫔 **[**BigMama:**](https://www.instagram.com/big.mama.plth/?utm_source=ig_web_button_share_sheet&igshid=OGQ5ZDc2ODk2ZA==) Gratitude for the certificates for delicious rolls received by our winners. As a secret, we will tell you that the establishment has a 10% discount for students, and also a 35% discount for blood donors with a certificate.

text: 🏰 During the hard battles with studying and homework, our dormitory becomes a fortress, and we are true knights in the fight against routine days. We invite you to a movie screening within the walls of 18! Tomorrow, November 10, interesting films await you, popcorn from the Trade Union, hot drinks, and delicious cookies from "Our Bakery of Capital Traditions". **When:** 18:00 **Where:** 7th floor hall. 🎥 We will start with the screening of "Sniper. The White Crow". This is not only an exciting story but also a reflection of our reality. The deep plot will not leave you indifferent. After the first film, there will be a break during which you can discuss impressions and share emotions with other participants. 🎬 At 20:30, the screening of the Ukrainian historical drama "Shchedryk" will start. The film embodies the clash of empires, the hopelessness of occupation, and the trap of World War II. Is it possible to reconcile the world with the melody of "Shchedryk"? Taking this opportunity, we urge you to help the Armed Forces. Let's support the collection of the [Trade Union](https://t.me/pskpi) for the preparation of quarter-wave antennas for radios, which increase the reception radius by 30%. 🔗 Link to the bank: https://send.monobank.ua/jar/51U8iZJtvg P.S.: __bring your favorite cups, neighbors, and a good mood!__
rephrased_news: A movie screening event is planned for November 10 in dormitory 18, featuring films and refreshments. The first film will start at 18:00, followed by a discussion break.
title: Movie Screening Invitation

text: **Attention!** Water pipe break on Oleksy Tykhyi Street. There may be a water outage in the student campus! **Make a water reserve!**
rephrased_news: A water pipe break on Oleksy Tykhyi Street may cause a water outage in the student campus, prompting residents to make water reserves.
title: Water Pipe Break Alert

text: [​​](https://telegra.ph/file/bfcb1019f997112c98155.jpg)🎥 The movie screening is in the past, so it's time to sum up! On December 10, within the walls of 18, the screenings of the films "Sniper. The White Crow" and "Shchedryk" took place. We express our sincere gratitude to our partners: 🍪 Thank you to ["Our Bakery of Capital Traditions"](https://maps.app.goo.gl/W6umedExeY4cRYB76) for the extraordinarily delicious cookies that made the movie screening even more unforgettable! 🍿 We are grateful to [KPI Trade Union](https://t.me/pskpi) for the popcorn that provided our evening with a special atmosphere. Also, we appreciate your opinion regarding future events and are always looking forward to suggestions and wishes. ❤️ Thank you for being with us!
rephrased_news: A summary of the recent movie screening event is provided, thanking partners for their contributions and inviting feedback for future events.
title: Movie Screening Summary

text: Friends, thanks to you, an extraordinarily large amount has been raised for heating pads for our military, and @rud_dash immediately purchased the materials. Production will start on Monday. There are enough materials for 750 HEATING PADS, which is a heavy load for one person, Dasha WILL NOT MANAGE WITHOUT YOUR HELP. On Friday, she is going to Kharkiv to meet with the military and hand them the heating pads so they can start warming the guys as soon as possible. Therefore, in 4 days, we need to make as many as possible. After her return, she will also be making heating pads, so if you can't make it now, still write! We kindly ask you - maybe someone wants to join our small company, take a break from studying, and socialize with new people. It's not necessary to come for all 4 days. The production of heating pads will be in the evenings. Also, LARGE POTS are very much needed. They can be reused later, as sodium acetate is a food additive. Please, pots are extremely necessary! Write to @rud_dash, she will add you to the chat. Wishing everyone peace and inspiration!
rephrased_news: A significant amount has been raised for heating pads for the military, with production starting soon. Volunteers are needed to assist in the process.
title: Heating Pads Production Call

text: **Dear 6th-year students, please note that you have 14 days to vacate the dormitory after graduation from the university. You must vacate by 14.02.2024. We want to emphasize that payment for accommodation during this period from 01.02.2024 will be at the rates for outsiders, which are: 4-bed - 1630 UAH per month 3-bed - 2117 UAH per month 2-bed - 3092 UAH per month 1-bed - 6016 UAH per month.** Administration of dormitory 18.
rephrased_news: 6th-year students are reminded to vacate the dormitory within 14 days after graduation, by 14.02.2024, with specific accommodation rates applicable during this period.
title: Dormitory Vacate Notice

text: Dear residents of the student campus, students, and university staff! We would like to draw your attention to the fact that at Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute, the program for separate waste collection has been restored, as required by the Law of Ukraine "On Waste Management." Currently, mesh-type containers have been installed in nine locations on the campus for temporary waste storage. Separate waste collection means collecting waste separately based on its type, characteristics, and composition in a way that facilitates its further processing. ✅ You should throw away waste such as glass, paper, plastic, and small metal containers from drinks into the mesh-type container. This project is attractive not only from an economic point of view, as it will reduce waste disposal costs, but it is also very important for preserving the cleanliness of our environment. ❤️ We hope for your understanding of the necessity of separate waste collection on the territory of Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute! Sincerely, the university administration!
rephrased_news: The separate waste collection program has been restored at KPI, with containers installed for different types of waste to promote recycling and environmental cleanliness.
title: Waste Collection Program Restored

text: ELECTRICITY SUPPLY: The student campus is investigating the cause of the outage and the preliminary timeline for restoration. If it is not restored by 17:00, we will start the generator in the trade union office, and we will inform you additionally. Missing the outages?
rephrased_news: The student campus is investigating the cause of a power outage, with plans to use a generator if restoration is not completed by 17:00.
title: Electricity Outage Investigation

text: ⚠️ **Emergency** An emergency power outage is occurring throughout the Shulyavka area and KPI. The estimated time for restoration, according to DTEK, is 18:00. If you need to charge your devices, please approach the security for a power bank. @kpicampus
rephrased_news: An emergency power outage is affecting the Shulyavka area and KPI, with restoration expected by 18:00. Residents can request power banks from security.

text: **Goodbye winter, hello spring🌷** We invite you to a delicious and vibrant **Maslenitsa 2024** in the best traditions of KPI! **On March 17 at 12:00**, come to the spring celebration of pancakes, games, and charity. This year, the student councils of KPI have united, so the event will be more massive than ever! We are looking for talented artists to participate. Fill out the [registration form](https://forms.gle/1jf1ypnxnsFxrA188) to be heard and seen! For those who wish to delight guests with handmade products, there is an opportunity to sell your goods. These can be jewelry, candles, toys, sweets, etc. The percentage to donate to the Armed Forces of Ukraine is up to each individual. We are waiting for you [at the link](https://forms.gle/3nEB77ufWgSACrok7)! Become a part of this extraordinary event and support the charity fair! **See you at Maslenitsa 2024** 🥞 [Student Council of the Faculty of Physics and Technology 💙](https://t.me/students_ipt)
rephrased_news: A spring celebration, Maslenitsa 2024, is scheduled for March 17 at 12:00, featuring pancakes, games, and charity. Talented artists are invited to participate.
title: Maslenitsa 2024 Celebration Invitation

text: 🎬 We invite you to watch a selection of films about the stories of women's struggle and victory in various fields of life! **When: March 9 at 19:30** Where: **7th floor hall** 🧪 At **19:30**, the science fiction thriller **"Dangerous Element"** will start. The film tells the story of the life, love, and scientific achievements of one of the most talented women scientists – Marie Curie, the first female Nobel Prize laureate. 💃 At **21:00**, the American comedy-drama **"The Devil Wears Prada"** will be shown, which tells the story of a young woman working at a powerful magazine but facing difficulties while collaborating with a tough editor. P.S.: **bring snacks, neighbors, and a good mood!**
rephrased_news: A film screening event is set for March 9, featuring stories of women's struggles and victories. Attendees are encouraged to bring snacks and enjoy the films.
title: Women's Stories Film Screening

text: **Elections for the Chair of the Student Council of the FEA 👨‍🎓** Do you want to nominate yourself? Then fill out the preliminary registration form (deadline **April 22 at 20:00**). rephrased_news: Elections for the Chair of the Student Council of the FEA are approaching. Interested candidates should fill out a preliminary registration form by April 22 at 20:00.

text: The elections for the head of the Student Council of the FEA are approaching, and this is a time for all of us to show activity and influence the life of our faculty. Each of us has unique ideas and plans that can make our student community even better and more active. So we encourage each of you to consider running for the position of head of the Student Council of the FEA! **Write**: @vallimarkk Or **register**: https://forms.gle/NJEtqpKTeHVz19Am7 __💪🏻 Let's create an FEA together where every student can unlock their potential and achieve success!__
rephrased_news: With elections for the head of the Student Council of the FEA approaching, students are encouraged to consider running for the position to contribute to the faculty's community.
title: Run for Student Council Head

text: 💦 Regarding hot water: "__Scheduled work has begun on the pipeline, estimated time - **until May 13** (inclusive)__" - Housing and Communal Services.
rephrased_news: Scheduled work on the pipeline has begun, with hot water supply expected to be unavailable until May 13.
title: Pipeline Work Scheduled

text: 🤩 **Eurovision in the dormitory** Tomorrow, **May 7**, the __first semi-final of the Eurovision Song Contest 2024__ will take place. We invite you to join us for the viewing in the cozy company of dormitory residents! Don’t forget to bring snacks and drinks! The duo __Alyona Alyona and Jerry Heil__ will perform under number 5, so be sure to come and listen to their performance! We will be waiting for you! P.S. Don’t forget to bring chairs 🪑 **Where**: 7th floor hall **When**: 22:00
rephrased_news: The first semi-final of the Eurovision Song Contest 2024 will be held on May 7, with residents invited to watch together in the dormitory.
title: Eurovision Viewing Party

text: Regarding hot water: ✅ Currently, repair work is ongoing at the CHPP that supplies hot water to the student campus; due to these circumstances, hot water supply is unavailable. ✅ From May 14, 2024, to May 28, 2024, hydraulic tests of the heating networks will be conducted. During this period, hot water supply will also be unavailable 😔
rephrased_news: Repair work is ongoing at the CHPP supplying hot water to the student campus, with hot water supply unavailable. Hydraulic tests of heating networks will occur from May 14 to May 28.
title: Hot Water Supply Issues

text: 💧**May without water** Hot water supply is absent in the dormitories due to a heating network break and corresponding repair work until May 13 at 23:59. After their completion, hydraulic tests of the pipes will begin until the end of the month. The estimated completion date for all work and return of water, according to Kyivteploenergo: May 28 – 31.
rephrased_news: Hot water supply is absent in the dormitories due to a heating network break and will remain unavailable until May 13, followed by hydraulic tests until the end of the month.
title: May Water Supply Disruption

text: 📺**Watching the Eurovision final at the Trade Union (partially)** We invite those interested tomorrow to the broadcast of the main musical event of the year at the student trade union. We will watch there until 23:50, and then we will transfer the equipment for further broadcasting to the dormitory with the most attendees, with the possibility of further showing in the dormitory, in the working room. To understand the interest in the dormitories - please like the dormitory numbers ([in the comments](https://t.me/qappos) to this post)👇
rephrased_news: Those interested are invited to watch the Eurovision final at the student trade union, with a broadcast planned until 23:50.
title: Eurovision Final Broadcast

text: We invite you to join the viewing of the Eurovision 2024 final! The poufs are honestly won at the [Trade Union](https://t.me/pskpi) **Where**: 7th floor **When**: 22:00
rephrased_news: Residents are invited to join the viewing of the Eurovision 2024 final at the Trade Union, starting at 22:00.
title: Join Eurovision Final Viewing

text: Attention!!! Please stock up on water. From 9:30 to 10:00, the water will be turned off. Repair work will be carried out. Approximately until 15:00-16:00. Administration of dormitory 18.

text: 💡**Power outage** Starting from May 16, hourly power outages may occur in Kyiv and the student campus according to the [schedule](https://www.dtek-kem.com.ua/ua/shutdowns) of Ukrenergo and DTEK. Preliminary outages may occur from 00:00 to 9:00 or from 16:00 to 24:00. @kpicampus
rephrased_news: Starting May 16, hourly power outages may occur in Kyiv and the student campus according to the schedule from Ukrenergo and DTEK.
title: Planned Power Outages Ahead

text: ⚡️⚡️⚡️**ATTENTION**⚡️⚡️⚡️ Due to **emergency power outages (not according to the schedule)**, there have been increased cases of people being trapped in elevators. Emergency crews are unable to quickly rescue people from traps. Therefore, it has been decided to **turn off the elevators until stabilization schedules for power outages are introduced.** Thank you for your understanding ❤️
rephrased_news: Due to emergency power outages, elevators will be turned off until stabilization schedules are introduced.
title: Elevators Disabled During Outages

text: Tomorrow (Monday), there will likely be a **power outage from 18:00 to 22:00**, according to the power outage schedule and the message from [Ukrenergo](https://t.me/Ukrenergo/2851).
rephrased_news: A power outage is likely tomorrow from 18:00 to 22:00, according to the power outage schedule.
title: Upcoming Power Outage Notice

text:
**🟢 Administration**

**Shelters**
Repairs are planned in 6 dormitories that have shelters by autumn.

**Power Banks**
For emergency charging, most dormitories have [power banks](https://t.me/ecokpi/142) available at the reception.

If you do not have a power bank or it is in poor condition, please request a replacement via @kpicampus_bot.

**Generators**
Will only be used in case of power outages lasting longer than 4 hours, and only for charging flashlights and phones.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: The administration has planned repairs in six dormitories with shelters by autumn and has power banks available for emergency charging.
title: Summer Accommodation Updates

text:
🔥🔥🔥Only 3 days left! 🔥🔥🔥
**On 24.05.24, we invite you to "POLYANA FEST"!!!**🕺🏻🤸🏻‍♂️🎸🎡🍭🍹🌮🌭
Spend your Friday in a useful and interesting way! 
We are sure that everyone will find something interesting to do and enjoy, and you will also contribute to a good cause. Donations collected at the festival will be transferred to [Charitable Foundation "Support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine 'Kyiv Polytechnic'"](https://t.me/kpifond), which supports KPI students defending Ukraine!

✌️✌️✌️Exciting and delicious locations await you! 
🏃🏼‍♀️**Sports:** tug of war, darts, table tennis, arm wrestling, board games, chess, table football.
[REGISTER HERE](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdNZca8P9nULbtM3TlKWerz0llK4NOcKeEy2mkOh9v_XqOE2w/viewform) ** and you will have SPORTS!**
📸**PHOTO ZONE**
👑**Beauty Zone**: body art, mehendi tattoos, face painting, and more.
🎹**CONCERT** of invited guests and an open mic for those who wish. [REGISTER HERE](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSebXAbpMPoMSEED4CZC_WLVgJXnT-PAYuAo2eeN7JuuI2JP-g/viewform) and you will have GLORY!
🍩🥤**FOOD COURT:** Treats from the best chefs of the Student Campus and partners. We will also have real barbecue and refreshing drinks!

❤️ Bring your friends, neighbors, teachers, and come!  

🕓**When: 24.05.2024 from 15:00 to 20:00**
📍**Where: Square of Building No. 12, "Polyana" Park.**
rephrased_news: On May 24, a festival called 'POLYANA FEST' will take place from 15:00 to 20:00, with proceeds supporting the Armed Forces of Ukraine.
title: Join Us for Polyana Fest

text:
🟢 **Administration**

**Accommodation**
The accommodation algorithm for the summer will be announced tomorrow, based on a similar, [last year's principle](https://t.me/kpicampus/1580).

The number of accommodation places for the next academic year is planned to increase by 1,500. Instructions for accommodation will be available by July 17.

**Elevators**
Elevators are starting to resume operation, but it is necessary to monitor the outage schedules to avoid getting stuck in the elevator in the middle of the night.

**Inventory**
From June 5 to June 7, an inventory commission will check the current state of inventory in the rooms.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: The accommodation algorithm for summer will be announced tomorrow, with plans to increase accommodation places for the next academic year by 1,500.
title: Summer Accommodation Plans

text:
‼️ **Debates of candidates for the position of rector of KPI**

Candidates who made it to the second round of elections will participate in the debates: Anatoliy Melnychenko and Oleksiy Zhuchenko.

The debates will take place without spectators and guests. Everyone interested will be able to watch the online broadcast.

**Proposed topics for discussion:**
🔹 paths and prospects for the development of the university;
🔹 vision of personnel policy at the university;
🔹 functioning of various areas of the university's activities.

⏰ **When:** June 14 at 15:00
📌 **Where:** [online broadcast on KPI Media](https://youtube.com/live/jPCLBt9x6Kg?feature=share)
rephrased_news: Debates for the position of rector of KPI will feature candidates Anatoliy Melnychenko and Oleksiy Zhuchenko on June 14 at 15:00, broadcast online.
title: Rector Election Debates Scheduled

text:
**🍸 Bachelor Party is coming…** 

Tired of thinking about studying for hours? The exam session is almost over, so it's time to think a little about yourself. Time to relax, party, and unwind! We invite everyone to the **Bachelor Party**, organized in honor of the end of the semester.

Forget about power outages, they won't stop us from having a great time!

What awaits you:
• A closed party in the style of the 2000s for KPI students and their friends
• A bar with a student menu
• Charity auctions, raffles, and beer pong
• Vibe music from a DJ

**When and where?**
June 27, from 18:00 to 23:00
[Forsage Dance Club, 51A Harnytnaya St.](https://maps.app.goo.gl/5qgPnR5j9pyYZnV86)

**Theme:**
American style, 2000s party

Entry **only with flyers**. They can be [purchased online](https://forms.gle/B1VZn1AdJy5kik6UA) for 150 UAH and picked up at the KPI Student Committee or at the club entrance (read more in the form). At the party, go to the bar and exchange the flyer for one free cocktail "Sportcomplex" 🍹

Bring your friends, come to the party, and together create the brightest memories of this summer ✨

[Student Council of the Faculty of Physics and Technology 💙](https://t.me/students_ipt)
rephrased_news: A Bachelor Party will be held on June 27 from 18:00 to 23:00 at Forsage Dance Club, celebrating the end of the semester with various activities.
title: Bachelor Party Announcement

rephrased_news: The repair of the hot water supply has been extended until 23:00 today, with an estimated return time tonight or tomorrow morning.
title: Hot Water Repair Update

text:
✋**Greetings, dear community!** 

Following the beautiful saying of Napoleon Bonaparte...
Who does not wish to feed their own army will soon feed someone else's...
...we have decided to create a **military-technical association at KPI that will do ✨interesting things✨**

**Who do we need?** Everyone. Really, everyone. If you want and can, we are waiting for you! Design, coding, soldering, testing - there are plenty of places for working hands. __And if you also have a sharp mind - you are priceless__, and for us, it means endless happiness to have such a person on the team (and besides, it’s additional experience for you😏)

Let’s work together to ensure that the brave can deliver "death to the enemies" effectively!🫦

[Fill out the form and join us](https://forms.gle/VBQZWPxXuzjA1ouQ7)

Take the opportunity now🦅
rephrased_news: A military-technical association is being created at KPI, seeking participants for various roles in design, coding, and testing.
title: Join Military-Technical Association

text:
🟢 **Administration 06.08**

**Accommodation**
Will begin on August 26, and by the end of the week, there will be lists for accommodation from faculties and institutes. A total of about 9,000 students are planned for mixed learning.

**Masters**
By August 2, they should have written an [application](https://docs.google.com/document/d/13FJxmoUKzXYeRo9T8oGxshdi3MXm1faIDpQwAO6Tk1E/edit?usp=sharing) for a change in payment format and extension of residence in the dormitory until August 31.

If you have not written an application, please contact the head of the dormitory.

**Hot Water**
In some dormitories, there has been no hot water for 3 months due to major repair work.

**Elevators**
Due to the stabilization of electricity supply, the operation of most elevators will be restored.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Accommodation for approximately 9,000 students will begin on August 26, with lists from faculties and institutes available by the end of the week. Master's students must submit applications for a change in payment format and dormitory extension by August 2. Some dormitories have lacked hot water for three months due to repairs, but the operation of most elevators will resume with the stabilization of electricity supply.
title: Accommodation Plans for Students

text:
🕯**A graduate of the Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Automation, Yevhen Oleksandrovych Yurdyha, gave his life for the independence of Ukraine.**

Yevhen graduated from our faculty in 2012 with a specialization in "Electric Stations".
During his studies, he was an active member of student self-government, serving as the head of the Student Council of the KPI Student Campus. After graduation, he worked in the department of administrative and economic work at KPI. He then worked at Yudjin Energy.
After the start of the full-scale invasion, he went to defend his homeland.
While carrying a wounded comrade from the battlefield during a heavy fight, he died as a hero.

The EEA team expresses sincere condolences to the family and friends of the deceased.

The time and place of the burial will be announced later.
rephrased_news: Yevhen Oleksandrovych Yurdyha, a 2012 graduate of the Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Automation, sacrificed his life for Ukraine's independence. He was active in student self-government and worked at KPI and Yudjin Energy before joining the defense efforts after the invasion. He died heroically while rescuing a wounded comrade. The EEA team extends condolences to his family and friends, with burial details to be announced later.
title: Tribute to Fallen Graduate

text: Hello everyone! Thank you for supporting the fundraiser for my dad. We raised a total of 42,000 UAH: 25,700 UAH was raised on my bank account, 10,000 UAH on the girl's account, and I personally contributed 7,000 UAH. We sent $1,000 in equivalent to my dad's brigade. With this money, last week we repaired the car, which is now actively used. Thank you to everyone who joined, and it was very unexpected that together we could raise such an amount.
rephrased_news: A fundraiser for my father has raised a total of 42,000 UAH, with contributions from various sources. The funds were used to repair a vehicle for my father's brigade, which is now actively in use. Thank you to everyone who contributed.
title: Fundraiser Success for Veteran

text:
🙌 **Recruitment of volunteers to assist with accommodation**

We are looking for volunteers who are ready to help newcomers with accommodation! This is a great opportunity to meet new people and make the lives of first-year students in the student campus easier.

If you have some free time and want to do something useful – fill out the [form at the link](https://forms.gle/3i48ThrZcRTxM3e68) **by August 25 inclusive.** We look forward to having you on our team!

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Volunteers are needed to assist newcomers with accommodation. This is an opportunity to help first-year students and meet new people. Interested individuals should fill out the form by August 25.
title: Volunteers Needed for Accommodation

text: Dear dormitory residents, due to the constant shelling of our cities (Kyiv, Poltava, Sumy, Lviv, and others) by the enemy, we strongly urge you not to ignore air raid signals and to hide in shelters in a timely manner. Take care of yourselves.
rephrased_news: Residents are reminded to heed air raid signals and seek shelter promptly due to ongoing shelling in various cities, including Kyiv.
title: Safety Reminder During Shelling

text: **Dear residents of the dormitories! We would like to remind you of the simple rules for living in the dormitories, specifically regarding the use of common areas.** **It is strictly prohibited:** 😡To flush down the toilets: hygiene products, bags, cotton pads, cotton swabs, wet wipes, food scraps (and not just scraps), vegetables, fruits, socks and underwear, dead fish and hamsters. 😡To pour down sinks and washbasins: used tea leaves, coffee grounds, hot grease, food scraps, etc. 😡To leave garbage in bags under the doors of rooms, in kitchens, hallways, and restrooms! **Failure to comply with these rules leads to sad consequences: clogged sewage, pipe bursts, unpleasant odors, and the inability for residents to use the common areas.** **Respect the place where you live, your neighbors, and the work of the technical staff – plumbers and cleaners.**
rephrased_news: Dormitory residents are reminded of important rules regarding the use of common areas, including prohibitions on flushing inappropriate items and leaving garbage in shared spaces, to prevent plumbing issues and maintain cleanliness.
title: Dormitory Living Rules Reminder

text: Possible power outage at 19:00. Please pay attention to this when using the elevator.
rephrased_news: A power outage is possible at 19:00, and residents should be cautious when using elevators.
title: Power Outage Alert at 19:00
